runs.comm: shoulders arms, goodish length and it moves away after pitching, left alone to the keeper
around a good length again, rocks forward and pushes that firmly towards cover
held it back just a hint, stood tall and patted it away towards point from the crease
short of a good length this time, not giving much room here, gets on the back foot does Charles and guides it to point

West Indies have lost Charles! Short and he went after it, made a bit of room and tried to slap it back over the bowler's head but totally mistimed, lobbed up towards mid-off and was an easy catch in the end
maiden to start with, ideal stuff for Sri Lanka, in the channel outside off, wider than the deliveries before this, leaves it be
a bit of away swing there for Kulasekara, widish delivery from the bowler there, leaves that alone
ohh, walks forward, took a couple of steps as that was bowled and then defended that good length delivery firmly towards mid-off
short of a good length, just a bit of away movement after pitching on middle and off, defends it to point
down the leg side and West Indies get their first run, Gayle leaves that alone and the Windies are off the mark
away movement again, nipping away from a goodish length, gets on the back foot and defends it watchfully towards point
beaten, beaten, comes down the track, wants to get a move on, pitched up and he misses as he drives against one that swings away past the outside edge
on leg stump, bowled at 130kmph, tries to tickle it fine, brushes the pads, no run on offer, excellent start by Kula and Angelo
short of a good length outside off, bowled at 129kmph, leaves that one alone outside off as it moves away
angling in towards off and middle, each dot ball's being cheered by this capacity crowd, defended off the back foot towards cover
takes his bottom-hand off that one as it struck him just under the handle, defended towards cover from the crease, no single on offer again

angling in towards middle and leg, appeal for lbw, as Marlon shufffled across to turn it square, struck him on the pads, Marlon's in a bit of pain, replays show it would have just clipped the top of leg stump, marginal, Aleem Dar had his doubts
first run off the bat, angling in towards middle and leg, gets a thick inside edge this time past square leg for a single
beaten, lovely bowling, pitched it up, tempted him with an away going ball that just beat the outside edge as Gayle tried to push through the line
width, on a good length and enough width for Marlon to free his arms, slams that past a diving extra cover for a boundary, relief for the batsmen
angling in this time, good bounce off a good length, takes his bottom hand off to defend it into the leg side
driven on the up this time, presents a straight bat to play it just wide of mid-off for a single

huge appeal for lbw, Taufel shakes his head, that struck him in line no doubt but it pitched outside leg, pitched outside and moved towards middle, just marginally outside leg stump mind you, was close, but just outside
punched off the front foot wide of mid-off to complete another quick single
nicely bowled and well played in the end, was surprised by the bounce and dropped it down with soft hands towards point, shot off from a good length
starts with a slower one does Malinga, 124.4, slower than his usual ones anyway, turned past square leg for a single
shortish on the off, drops it down to pick a single again
was surprised by that extra bounce again, seemed to me to be the offcutter, 124.5kmph, cut away to go past the outside edge as Gayle dropped his hands on that one
takes his bottom hand off that one as well and guides that one towards third man for a single, Malinga bowling cutters
another offcutter, Samuels runs that one down to third man for a single
drops that short outside off, a bit quicker than the rest but not by much, Gayle leaves that one alone
goes on straight, punched off the back foot towards mid-off, short of a good length
edged and just wide of slip, floated it on a good length outside off, opened the face past Mahela for a single
the legspinner, goes down the leg side, lands on leg and turns down, tries to sweep fine, misses, called a wide

the legspinner again, shortish on leg stump and turning down, quicker through the air this time and Gayle is struck on the pads as he tries to whip it square, big appeal for lbw, was missing leg, replays show that would have hit leg, so my bad.
Gayle tries to sweep that shortish delivery down leg, caught on the glove, it pops up in front of short fine, lands safe

Gayle's trapped in front, this went straight on, Gayle was caught in front again, rocked forward but not much to defend but played a little outside the line to that, struck him in line with middle and leg and Taufel had no doubt this time, was flatter and straighter this time
beaten, slipped it quicker outside off, shortish and it spat away to go past the outside edge as Bravo flirted with it
Samuels goes over the top, slower ball from Mathews, lands full outside off and he drives it uppishly towards deep cover for a single
drops that one short on leg stump, caught on the glove as he fends it into the leg side
angling in towards off, gets forward and knocks it towards point from the crease
shortish on the off, slower one, punched towards deep cover for a single
slower one bowled on a length, pushes it towards deep cover for a single, Malinga covers that and prevents the second
kept a little low this time, angling in towards middle and leg and appears to strike the handle as he tries to fend it into the leg side
floating it full on middle, Bravo gets across and drives it to deep midwicket for a single, a bit of air on that one
shortish outside off, turns away this time and goes past the outside edge as he tries to late-cut that
pitched on a length on the off stump and it's driven back to the bowler
Samuels wanted to attack that, tossed up on middle and leg, tries to smash it over long-on, got an inside edge onto the pads
flighted on the off, rocks forward and eases that past extra cover for a couple of runs into the deep
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot to push it to point, another tight over
cutters reign, shortish outside off and he can only chop that down to point
chips that past extra cover in the direction of long-off, just a very tight line from Mathews
down the leg side, angling down leg as Bravo tries to work that fine, called a wide
shortish outside off, cuts it wide of third man but good fielding from Dananjaya at third man, returned a good throw to keep them to a single

smashed, Malinga does well at deep cover, diving to his right, remember he dropped Hafeez in the semi, this time he throws himself to his right against that well-struck drive on the up and keeps them to two runs
drives on the up again does Samuels as he's given some width, plays it wide of long-off, Kulasekara runs to his left and cuts it off, two more
yorker length from Mathews this time, in the blockhole outside off and Samuels just bumps that in towards Sangakkara, dot and the end of a superb spell
struck on the pads, the offspinner, Bravo moved across to work it square, may have got an inside edge on the pads as it struck him in line, just the single
comes down the track and chips it over square leg for a single
waits for it to turn in, slightly short, turns it wide of square leg for one more
tries to charge down the track and get to the pitch but it turns in, can't connect as he tries to swing with the spin, misses and it takes the pads and goes to short fine
turning in from outside off, flighted this time, gets outside the line to defend that
this one turned the other way, Marlon didn't pick that initially, saw it turn away and could only defend it back to the bowler
slapped down towards long off from a full length
over the top, mistimed down the ground and spilled by Kulasekara, tough chance running around the boundary
flicked down to long on from the stumps, bit of a slog
blocked away into the point region on the back foot
goes back and gets in a tangle, lucky to inside edge it into midwicket
driven hard but straight to extra cover
back of a length, cut out through the covers
finally a big shot, swung away from a full length on the stumps, gets it over midwicket, was a googly but Bravo took it full enough and timed it perfectly
offspinner blocked forward around the off stump
back foot push through the covers again, just a single
forward outside off, blocked into the covers, big stride in there
full length, too straight, worked for two between the deep fielders
excellent yorker, right in the hole, dug out through square leg, really well bowled
full length on the leg stump, doesn't quite get this in the hole and Samuels steps outside leg stump and whacks it into the stands over midwicket
six more, this time over extra cover, if Malinga doesn't get it spot it he can disappear, and again it was a half-volley, the front leg was cleared and a clean-as-a-whistle strike ensued
length this time and guided down to third man
gets it right in the hole again, dug out down to long on
clear the front leg and once again, when Malinga misses his length he goes far and this is smashes over long on
tapped to short third man, fumble from the young lad gives away a single
back and pulled into midwicket
slap down to long off staying on the back foot
outside off, went to fiddle it fine and missed
outside off again, dropped into cover point for a single

forward around off stump, big cry for leg before, was it pad first? Yes says the umpire and Bravo has to go. He was caught around the knee roll playing forward around off stump, I had doubt of whether he was in line and especially whether there was bat involved but umpire Taufel thought both favoured the bowler and that it wasn't too high either, another big blow
played down to long off on the back foot
slugs the first ball down the ground, it bombs its way to long on, looked like an inside edge that
down the wicket and timed perfectly into the stands, lovely strike again and he's trying to rescue his side here, 50 for him now
goes again and gets it in the gap at cow corner, dragged it slightly but effective
down the wicket, dropped in shorter, checks the shot and chips it on the bounce to long on
horrible slog this, off the toe down to long on, still raced away again
yer, didn't read that, push outside off and missed by a mile to the wrong 'un

outside off, cut to point and taken on the juggle spilled it above his head to start with but managed to turn and grab it on the rebound. Another big hitter falls to spin, Pollard was reaching out to cut a quite wide back of a length ball, got it in the air above the head of the fielder who reached up with two hands, parried the chance before turning and grabbing with two hands

swept off the stumps first ball, missed and given out lbw looked pretty straight, a dangerous shot first up and paid the price, I think Taufel has got this decision right. The batsman was late on the stroke and caught on the knee roll
tossed up wide outside off Sammy drives and oh! Gets an inside edge past the stumps, lucky
back on his stumps and flicking back to the bowler
forward and dropped into the covers, they take a quick single and there's a direct hit from Mathews, and Sammy just gets back in time
fine off-stump yorker, dug out down the ground
step across the stumps and tucked a length ball to short long leg
again, Malinga just missed the length, wide of off stump too, Samuels reaches across and carves it wide of third man for four, rocketed to the rope
short now, swung at again, comes off the toe of the back, he was a little late on the hook but sails over the rope
oh my days this has travelled a ridiculously long distance, full ball on the stumps and, well, it has gone 108 metres, what a strike
and now he fancies the strike, going across the stumps to take a single to third man

not any more, pulled down midwicket's throat it was hit hard and flat and straight to the fielder. Went back to try and find the leg side stands but didn't get the elevation and it was straight to the fielder who took it well and did a little Gayle-style dance
tossed up on the off stump, played into the covers for a single
tossed up, played down to long on
step across the stumps and flicked with the angle to short long leg
outside off, powerful drive down to long off
fired in flatter, strikes the pad as Sammy as he tries to play to leg
good full ball, Samuels would have hit that for six but Ramdin got in a fuss outside it and could only drive it through the covers
another great yorker, dug out and it flies to long leg for four, very lucky but more runs off Malinga
full ball again, swung to leg, gets it off the edge to short long leg
a lean outside off and edge down to third man
swung into the off side, totally mistimed, but it lands short of deep cover, lucky again for Sammy
super yorker, batsman did very well to dig that out, they take a single
slower length ball, pulled into the leg side, mistimed again so it lands in no-man's heath
swung into the same region, this is far better timing and finds the gap between long on and deep midwicket
hard slap down to long off, the charge back for the second, I thought the fielder could have done better there
full ball, slapped down in that cow corner gap again, a chase from long on saves four, Dilshan down there
slapped down to long off again, the charge back for the second again, Sammy gets hit by the throw, did he change his line of running there? What he has done is ran one short
full ball, cracked down the ground and this goes all the way for four
